markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Incredible Familiar (Familiar Master)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1975) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 174 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Familiar Master](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=60)

**Prerequisites**
[Enhanced Familiar](/Feats.aspx?ID=318)

</column>

---

Your familiar is infused with even more magic than other familiars. You can select six familiar or master abilities each day, instead of four.
name: Incredible Familiar (Familiar Master)
